name: Chicago JavaScript Meetup Group
description: Meet other local JavaScript Developers to network, share knowledge, to review the state of the art, or to dream up new applications.

name: Chicago Node.js
description: A group to discuss Node.js, its frameworks, and best practices.

name: React Chicago
description: This meetup is focused on bringing everyone together who have an interest in React, React Native, and it's ecosystem.

name: AngularJS Chicago
description: AngularJS meetup group in Chicago, IL discussing how to leverage and evolve the 'Superheroic JavaScript MVW Framework'.

name: Chicago Ember.js
description: Chicago's Ember.js group is committed to creating a robust community built around the philosophy of building beautifully crafted web applications with the help of Ember.js.

name: Chicago ReasonML
description: A new programming language from Facebook, ReasonML combines Javascript syntax with Ocaml's AST for high quality, fast javascript.
